resources.string: We are the Crushers Group and we are Students at the University of Gothenburg studying Software Engineering and Management
Linked below is our GitHub Repository, as well as contact information of our team members
In case you want to talk to us personally, below are linked our email addresses:

We did this project because, according to statistics, 59% of Swedes failed their theoretical driving license exam in 2021. Hence, we decided to create an App that helps all aspiring drivers to visually learn about driving theory and be able to drive a virtual car.
